dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

dependent_to.description:
Black is the uncompromising Python code formatter. By using it, you
agree to cede control over minutiae of hand-formatting. In return, Black
gives you speed, determinism, and freedom from pycodestyle nagging about
formatting.
dependent_to.name: py-black

dependent_to.description: Run any standard Python code quality tool on a Jupyter Notebook.
dependent_to.name: py-nbqa

dependent_to.description: A tool to automatically upgrade syntax for newer versions.
dependent_to.name: py-pyupgrade

description: A wrapper around the stdlib `tokenize` which roundtrips.
name: py-tokenize-rt

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
